item.title: 其他
item.author: shat0806449@gmail.com (Robert Lee)
item.description: Beautiful Hugo adds a few custom shortcodes created by Li-Wen Yip and Gert-Jan van den Berg for making galleries with PhotoSwipe . Sphere Triangle For full details please see the hugo-easy-gallery GitHub page. Basic usages from above are: te a gallery with open and close tags {{< gallery >}} and {{< /gallery >}} {{< figure src=“image.jpg” >}} will use image.jpg for thumbnail and lightbox {{< figure src=“thumb.jpg” link=“image.jpg” >}} will use thumb.
